message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $120. I think it will be very valuable for you.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your generosity, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $95 for the product. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't let it go for less than $110. It's a very good price for what you're getting.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered your proposal, but I still believe there might be a better deal out there for me. I am willing to pay $100 for the product, which is the maximum I am willing to spend. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
